title: How to Kill a Feral Ghoul Reaver in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Equip medium armor.
steps.description: Reavers can smash through heavy armor, and break it easier, so there's no point wasting it.

steps.headline: Keep an energy weapon on hand.
steps.description: Laser or Plasma Rifles are great (Tri-Beam Laser Rifles if you have them). If you have the Mothership Zeta DLC, use alien weaponry.

steps.headline: Stock up on medical supplies.
steps.description: You will need Stimpacks, Med-X, Jet, and possibly Rad-Away.

steps.headline: Locate the Feral Ghoul Reaver(s).
steps.description: Try to sneak up on them.

steps.headline: Lock onto the Reaver with V.A.T.S.
steps.description: Attack them at least twice. Aim at their torso if you're not close enough to get in a clean headshot.

steps.headline: Engage them.
steps.description: If there are other ghouls, take them out quickly so they don't get in the way.

steps.headline: Repeatedly use V.A.T.S.
steps.description: on the Reaver. Use some Jet when you get low, and fire again. Aim for the head; it will kill them faster.

steps.headline: Run in large, wide circles while attacking the Reaver.
steps.description: Dodge their swings when they get close by sidestepping at the last moment. Avoid the radioactive gunk they throw if you are at a distance.

steps.headline: Keep this up until the Reaver is dead.

Repeatedly use V.A.T.S. on the Reaver. Use some Jet when you get low, and fire again. Aim for the head; it will kill them faster. Run in large, wide circles while attacking the Reaver. Dodge their swings when they get close by sidestepping at the last moment. Avoid the radioactive gunk they throw if you are at a distance. Keep this up until the Reaver is dead.
